<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Change Load Balancer Pools</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/lbaas-pools"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Change Load Balancer Pools associated with the user's account.
